biotools.summary: A database of similar protien-ligand binding and putative pockets. Using a novel algorithm, we conducted a large-scale all-pairs search for known and potential binding sites in the Protein Data bank, and discovered over 14 million similar pairs of binding sites.

bioschemas.name: PoSSuM
